name: Generation Zero
summary: Welcome to the 1980's Sweden. The population has gone missing, and machines of unknown origin roam the streets. Explore a vast open-world to unravel the mystery of the invader, perfect your fighting strategies, and engage intense action-packed battles as you strike back. Play alone, or together with up to three friends in a seamless multiplayer, as you set out to defeat and destroy the enemy.
info:
• 中文名: 零世代
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: PC

  • 游戏引擎: APEX
  • 游玩人数: 1-4
  • 发行日期: 2019年3月26日
